main.name: Morgan Johnson
main.description: Curious, self driven and a couple cups of coffee along the way
main.bio: I`m a Florida based UX Designer that enjoys making meaningful designs through every day life. UX spiked my interest after 7 years in the motorcycle industry. Learning how to simplify a process to be more efficient is my key to life. Digging into the design process and learning all the whys behind the design is my new new obsession. Design soultuions are everywhere, who would have thought a red Go button would make me change my whole career.

work.title: Office Manager
work.description: In charge of balacning accounts and paying bills, as well as factory rebate reconciliation. Responsible for running reports and making sure manufactures and suppliers and paid accordingly. Assisted General Manager with inventory management and dealer transfers. Title and Registration for all sales units.

projects.title: Love Me True Rescue Case Study

testimonials.text: Sonny is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
